delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full control of all site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full control of all site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete document libraries and lists in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write items and lists in all site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete document libraries and lists in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write items and lists in all site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read items in all site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the current user's project enterprise resources.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the current user's project enterprise resources.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete the current user's project enterprise resources.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write project enterprise resources
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete the current user's project enterprise resources.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write project enterprise resources

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the current user's files.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the current user's files.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete the current user's files.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete the current user's files.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the current user's projects.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the current user's projects.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete the current user's projects.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete the current user's projects.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all ProjectWebApp site collections the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Have full control of all ProjectWebApp site collections
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all ProjectWebApp site collections the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full control of all ProjectWebApp site collections

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to run search queries and to read basic site info on behalf of the current signed-in user. Search results are based on the user's permissions instead of the app's permissions.
delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDisplayName: Run search queries as a user
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to run search queries and to read basic site info on behalf of the current signed-in user. Search results are based on the user's permissions instead of the app's permissions.
delegatedScopesList.consentDisplayName: Run search queries as a user

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to submit project task status updates the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to submit project task status updates the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read managed metadata and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read managed metadata and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete managed metadata and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete managed metadata and to read basic site info on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read user profiles and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read user profiles and basic site info on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read and update user profiles and to read basic site info on behalf of the signed-in user.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and update user profiles and to read basic site info on your behalf.

delegatedScopesList.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to access a subset of site collections with a signed-in user. The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.
delegatedScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to access a subset of site collections on your behalf. The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Have full control of all site collections

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allow the application to access a subset of site collections without a signed in user. The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.
Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete document libraries and lists in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write items and lists in all site collections

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read enterprise managed metadata and to read basic site info without a signed in user.
Allows the app to write enterprise managed metadata and to read basic site info without a signed in user.
Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.
Allows the app to read and update user profiles and to read basic site info without a signed in user.
